title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets sail with his crew to find the legendary One Piece treasure and become the Pirate King.

title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto Uzumaki dreams of becoming the strongest ninja in his village and leader of his ninja squad.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid creatures known as Titans, while uncovering the mysteries of their existence.

title: Great Teacher Onizuka (GTO)
author: Tohru Fujisawa
description: Eikichi Onizuka, an ex-biker gang leader, becomes a teacher at a high school known for its delinquents, aiming to be the greatest teacher ever.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Gon Freecss, a young boy, aspires to become a Hunter in order to find his father, who is also a legendary Hunter.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Follow the adventures of Goku as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the Dragon Balls, powerful artifacts that can grant any wish.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a Soul Reaper and defends humans from evil spirits known as Hollows, while uncovering secrets about his own past.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Light Yagami discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it, leading to a battle of wits with the enigmatic detective L.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without superpowers in a world where they are common, dreams of becoming a hero like his idol All Might.
